Title: Variety
Plot: Said returns from the hole ready to apologize to White. The inmate variety show takes shape with Busmalis as MC and White the featured performer. Robson's painful teeth force him to the dentist, something he secretly fears. The dentist recommends gum replacement surgery. Alvarez wants to give his dog to Rivera the Oz guard he blinded. ParentalRatingReason: Violence, nudity, sex scenes & offensive language.
GuestStars: Aasif Mandvi, Antoni Cornacchione, Joel West, Andy Powers, Toni Lewis
